page.title: 04Stoke-Farm-Centre & Health
page.content:
THE MODEL FARM: is not a farm at all - it is a Dogs-Boarding and Riding Instruction Centre.They look after 3 dogs,a mother and puppies,and horses: Rusty,19 years, was taken in because he was ill-treated, Lucy had tetnus, Blackie,aged 30,is kept for its owners.They also do clippings.
HEALTH: In Poringland there are 2 doctors who work together.In Framingham Earl there is also joint partnership,this clinic also includes family planing,Cervical Cytology, Anti-Natal Clinic and Immunsations by appointment. In Poringland or Framingham Earl there are no dentists or chemists or opticions, or old peoples homes.
